1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: It has been related in a narration from Ibn Umar that :the Prophet said: "Whoever performs Wudu while in a state of purity, Allah writes for him on account of it ten good merits

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوُضُوءِ لِكُلِّ صَلاَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been Related] About Performing Wudu For Every Salat
